title: Infinitely Long Login Queue?
body:
Basically what the title said.
I get dropped into the queue but whenever the queue times end it just resets again. 
I've been waiting for almost half an hour now :/

replies.body: Thanks for the report - we're looking into issues with logging on and a login queue. We'll be [updating this thread ](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/9rNOyg9Q-login-issues-and-client-disconnection-02022016) when we've got  updates.
Still no reply from riot here. Still waiting 50 mins for a game. Going to play some Blizzard games where they know how to set up a Que system..........
Same thing here. Obviously not a 1 off
